name: Release Celebration Grimoire
noticeMessage:
Note: The Medal of Desire from this grimoire can be acquired by the following:
Type: Medal of Desire (VII)
Amount: 10 medals from grimoire x1, 100 medals from grimoire x11
Note: The Medal of Desire (VII)s from this grimoire will expire at a certain date. Check the medal exchange for more info.
